CmdLine: apt-get update && apt-get install -y         libfreetype6-dev         libjpeg62-turbo-dev         libmcrypt-dev         libpng12-dev     && docker-php-ext-install -j$(nproc) iconv mcrypt     && docker-php-ext-configure gd --with-freetype-dir=/usr/include/ --with-jpeg-dir=/usr/include/     && docker-php-ext-install -j$(nproc) gd
Commands.Name: run
